text:
Oh you’re from Iceland, that’s so cool! So why do you feel like a vfx company was not for you? Is it the famous grind? I’ve heard quite a few horror stories about that!

Wow it sure sounds like you’ve had an interesting run of your career, that really gives me hope honestly. :)

But yes that is what I am most interested in! I dabbled in comp in Nuke for a while as well and quite enjoyed it, but idk. We are expected to more or less focus on one thing when creating a portfolio and so I mostly abandoned any projects beyond modelling/texturing. And that would be amazing!!
